channel.title: Nosy Neighbors
channel.description: Chinedu Unaka & Candice Thompson highlight the wildest neighbor stories of the week: dissecting/analyzing Karens, settling disputes, unpacking petty posts on local forums, and celebrating good neighborly behavior. Each episode will feature a call from a fellow comedian with their tales of their own notable neighbors. New episodes return January 13, 2022!

item.title: Hurled Apples
item.description: Ft. J.D Witherspoon | Nothing says family memories like consuming a teddy bear made out of chicken; Candice & Chinedu wonder why apples and apple juice don’t taste the same; J.D. recalls living below bongo playing floor stomping Centaur children. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: I Like It Ass First
item.description: Ft. Francisco Ramos | A burglar in Philly pulls a sh*t and run; Candice and Chinedu contemplate which kind of water makes the nastiest splash; a lost hiker has one missed call (from her rescue crew). Francisco wards off the threats of a dog-phobic neighbor. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: I Call My Nipples Plates
item.description: Ft. Fahim Anwar | Prurient technology and newscasts abound; anybody got a house they don’t want? asking for a friend; speaking of housing, a fun AirBnB scam story; all the single dads, watch out for Candice. Fahim recalls the adventures of being racially ambiguous in a Latino neighborhood. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: I’m Thick and I Can Drive
item.description: Ft. Josh Johnson | All things department of motor vehicles like crashing into the DMV before taking a driver’s test, a vampire is surprised to not appear in their driver’s license photo, Josh recalls the numerous pedestrian collisions he’s witnessed. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: 6 Melatonins, And Still I Rise
item.description: Ft. Patrick Cloud | A cat posts its own obituary, Chinedu and Candice discuss repurposing gently used masonic gowns and curses gone wrong- things got real occult-y real fast, Patrick commits a revenge robbery and offers financial advice.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: We’re Big in the Sahara
item.description: Ft. Joyelle Johnson | Candice & Chinedu report from the wild, wild, West, a very special episode of animals doing the most like an elk with a unique rubber accessory, twerking bears and a jet setting monkey, Joyelle and the Craigslist roommate from hell. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: An Even Five Dollars
item.description: Ft. Sydney Castillo | Candice & Chinedu want a refund, paranormal vehicular activity at a local cemetery, a thief has his pants stolen mid robbery, Sydney tries to offer assistance to a neighbor in a compromising position.      Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: A Bounty of Nuts
item.description: Ft. Justine Marino | Fences and not the Denzel Washington kind either, making Mountain Dew more extreme than it already is, a man gets drunk and starts searching for himself- literally, a squirrel’s nut stash is raided, Justine recalls befriending a Z-list celeb. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: N*ggas On Foot!
item.description: Ft. Ian Edwards | Another opening, another poop joke, make sure to self-reflect before posting, recommendations on navigating dental scams and dams, field trips and stripper poles-welcome to public school, Ian owns a racist with a crappy car. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Arson Is Fire?
item.description: Ft. Kiran Deol | Vengeful crows, rowdy roosters, buckets of bird smuggled from a locked-down KFC, and a suspect wearing an inflatable swan--this bird sh*t cray! Kiran tells two tales of a busted prostitution ring & a very thorough arsonist. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: A Casual Pooping
item.description: Ft. Paul Elia | A woman finds poop next to pizza rolls in the freezer section; Chinedu waxes poetic on peppermint & sweet, sweet matcha; goats get busy in a car in Queens; don’t let the wheelchair fool you! Paul’s bullies will slap him for any reason.   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Of Mice and Marijuana
item.description: Ft. Will Miles | Happening in these streets this week: an Atlanta woman finds a one-eared mouse grubbin’ on her weed; a bunch of G.O.A.T.s herd goats in Colorado; Will definitely wouldn’t murk a bear, but a gang bangin racoon? Oh, it’s on! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Homeless and Sauceless
item.description: Ft. Chase Anthony | Dry nuggets lead to a bomb threat in Iowa; an adult booty is stuck in a child’s swing in the West Village; newlyweds invoice their wedding no-shows; Chase’s neighbors get out of hand with either flour or cocaine. Hard to say… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Crime Pays If You’re Good At It
item.description: Ft. Justin Martindale | Panty lines are getting to Chinedu; Jehovah’s Witnesses may be sliding in the DMs soon; police intervene in a hardware store exorcism; there’s an elephant in the room between Justin & the pastor’s wife. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: A Tree in Every Pothole
item.description: Ft. Kennelia Stradwick | Today, a mime wakes up and chooses violence; zebras are wild ‘n out in the DC suburbs; Hampton U represent! Kennelia has unresolved issues with her Karen-ish former roommate over a big booty tv and cable bill. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Special Lady Special
item.description: Ft. Whitney Cummings | Chinedu’ll go above & beyond to return a lost sandwich--unless it’s a chicken caesar wrap; a love bird might’ve been saving up for a visit to a podiatrist, and the neighbor, really, really, shouldn’t have cut Whitney’s trees! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Dirty White Fingers
item.description: Ft. Megan Gailey | Cows roll through a burger joint in Iowa; Candice knows which pro wrestlers didn’t rob a pharmacy; a jar of weed gifted to Megan may’ve been a trojan horse; a dead-eyed Karen calls the cops...over nacho fries... Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Really Cool Chlamydia
item.description: Ft. Bresha Webb | A TMI ask about STIs; cops running on CP time; a dish-licker makes Candice wonder why there isn’t more roommate on roommate violence; girl interrupted--a special delivery in real time during storytime with Bresha. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Goat Meat and Prayers
item.description: Ft. Dave Merheje | Candice & Chinedu debate living free or dying with 80lbs of explosives at a gender reveal in NH; a woman goes ham over a goat paternity test request; and Dave’s sister, puff, puff, passes out and scares the neighborhood connect. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: 19” of Hair, 19” of Karma
item.description: Ft. Rell Battle | This week, Candice recalls a stalker who slid into her DMs a while back while Chinedu reminisces about a flirtatious and fried-chicken-loving former math teacher; a church burglary suspect transforms into Batman mid-heist.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: A Kidney With Conditions
item.description: Ft. London Brown | Chinedu’s got blue balls from bagels; pizza dough goes flying in a very, very NY-style assault; co-workers exchange kidneys to save each others’ husbands; and success saves London from getting jumped.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: They’re Stretch Marks, Chinedu
item.description: Ft. Tahir Moore | A supposedly temporary roommate overstays their welcome by 3-4 years in Candice’s neighborhood; a swimmer, high on weed or on meth, attempts a swim to NJ from Manhattan; and Tahir had no idea he was kidnapped. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Savvy With the Benadryl
item.description: Ft. Aida Rodriguez | It’s a bad day when you get punched over some fried chicken; a Florida man pulls a Mike Tyson on his friend’s ear; a spiteful Michigan man retaliates with a giant poop wall; and Aida questions a woman’s dick print evidence. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Tiffany Haddish KO’s Crackhead
item.description: Ft. Tiffany Haddish | Well, that’s what “hood Tiffany” woulda done! Also, a man steals almost $2k in candy from a CVS; a child gets a face tattoo at a Mickey D’s; and it’s DIY DEI time with this week’s Karen. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: S2: Back on the Block!
item.description: Season 2 of Nosy Neighbors is out now! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: D for Don’t Come Here
item.description: Ft. Baron Vaughn | Welp there goes the neighborhood! It’s the season finale with Candice’s can’t miss “peeping Tim” tale; ravens and raccoons running games in these streets; and Baron philosophizing on a road trip guided by petty crowd-sourced reviews. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Common Sense Ain’t Common
item.description: Ft. Damon Wayans Jr. | Today, a woman goes down a manhole and makes a surprising discovery; a landlord claps TF back at reviews on his vacation rental property; and Damon casually recalls a house guest that overstayed their welcome: Michael Jordan. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Filling Is Cheap
item.description: Ft. Amanda Seales | Chinedu sheds a tear over a petty assault with a perfectly fine doughnut; Candice debates the merits of throwing grits, hot grease (or cold grease) on anyone; and Amanda serves up three short neighborhood stories in small doses. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Habitual Snitches
item.description: Ft. Jesus Trejo | A runaway tortoise; kids driving kids in a Kia; plus a trifling prison break and why Jesus needs an in-unit washer and dryer ASAP.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Enemy In Your Home
item.description: Ft. Asif Ali | This week, Candice & Chinedu fixate on the other dark meats: human “tri-tip,” and domesticated pigeons (with a side of cheese and asparagus); and Asif is still creeped out by his roommate’s serial killer-like hovering.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Slut Shaming the Lion
item.description: Ft. Jenny Zigrino | This week: a “confirmed adjacent” report of a lion on the loose in Chicago; a Florida woman is repeatedly cited for overfeeding feral cats; and Jenny takes on a local “slasher” in a head-scratcher of a WhoDunIt. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: It’s My [Poop] In a Box!
item.description: Ft. Ego Nwodim | Candice and Chinedu can deal with anthrax but people pooping in mailboxes? Nah. Keep it. Plus, a cautionary tale from Ego about thirst, panties and pants. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Oh, We Dying TONIGHT!
item.description: Ft. KevOnStage | Candice and Chinedu discuss piss equity for women; a not-so-single-someone seeks love; plus a pop-up gang initiation in Kev’s front yard. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: It’s in the Budget, Man!
item.description: Ft. Yvonne Orji | Chinedu recalls an encounter with klepto-kids and his clothes; Candice questions a job posting for condom testers; and R.I.P. DMX--Yvonne tells the tale of a bar-setting unexpected friendship with the white girl next door. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Sorry, We’re At Capacity
item.description: Ft. Zainab Johnson | Today, living rent free in Candice and Chinedu’s heads: Neighbors throwing ninja stars, a missing porch in Detroit, and why Zainab won’t hold the elevator for you. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Crack Rats and Extra D*ck Skin
item.description: Ft. Roy Wood Jr. | Candice and Chinedu break down a naked assault at a popular hotel, a new mom crowdsources opinions on circumcising her child, and Roy tells the tale of Ms. Murray, “the one white flight that didn’t fly.” Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Neighborhood Appropriation
item.description: Ft. Carl Tart | Welcome to the ‘hood! Candice and Chinedu discuss a plea from one neighbor to others to stop throwing hot dogs in their backyard, arson at a local Starbucks, a pissed off and pissing Karen, and Carl tells a story about a man, a van, and possible crackhead behavior. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
